attributes.action: Cancel MP's housing expenses and provide compulsory state owned accommodation
attributes.additional_details:
MP's are claiming expenses and purchasing houses at the ordinary tax payers expense. In these financially troubled times, when everyone else has to tighten their belts, the country can not afford this luxury and it is morally wrong.

My petition is to stop payment of accommodation expenses to MP's and provide state owned accommodation (council housing). This would reduce the national debt and be more acceptable to the general public.
